          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sprains</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verstauchungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Entorses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Torceduras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Distorsioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Sprains</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esguinces</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a sprained ankle. This type of injury happens when a ligament is overstretched causing pain and swelling of the affected joint.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ankle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">injuries</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Joints</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ligaments</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">overstretching</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sprains</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">swelling</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen sprained Knöchel. 
Dieser Typ der Verletzung geschieht, wenn ein Ligament die 
Schmerz und das Schwellen der betroffenen Verbindung verursachend 
overstretched.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une cheville foulée. 
Ce type de dommages se produit quand un ligament est surétendu 
causant la douleur et gonfler du joint affecté.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um tornozelo torcido. 
Este tipo de ferimento acontece quando um ligament overstretched
que causa a dor e inchar da junção afetada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una caviglia storta. 
Questo tipo di ferita accade quando un legamento overstretched 
che causa il dolore ed il gonfiamento del giunto affected.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ότι το α ο αστράγαλος. 
Αυτός ο τύπος τραυματισμού συμβαίνει πότε ένας σύνδεσμος 
είναι η πρόκληση του πόνου και η διόγκωση της επηρεασθείσας 
ένωσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un tobillo torcido. 
Este tipo de lesión sucede cuando un ligamento se estira 
demasiado que causa dolor e hincharse del empalme afectado.</string>
          </description>
